<S%H4100>Why<s%> have we <S%H6684>fasted,<s%> say they, and you <S%H7200>see<s%> not? why have we <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> our <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and you take <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge?<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H6685>fast<s%> you <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure,<s%> and <S%H5065>exact<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6092>labors.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> shall your <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H1234>break<s%> forth as the <S%H7837>morning,<s%> and your <S%H724>health<s%> shall <S%H6779>spring<s%> forth <S%H4120>speedily:<s%> and your <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be your rear <S%H622>guard.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H7725>turn<s%> away your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> from <S%H6213>doing<s%> your <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> on my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> a <S%H6027>delight,<s%> the <S%H6918>holy<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3513>honorable;<s%> and shall <S%H3513>honor<s%> him, not <S%H6213>doing<s%> your own <S%H1870>ways,<s%> nor <S%H4672>finding<s%> your own <S%H2656>pleasure,<s%> nor <S%H1696>speaking<s%> your own <S%H1697>words:<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> shall you <S%H6026>delight<s%> yourself in the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will cause you to <S%H7392>ride<s%> on the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H398>feed<s%> you with the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> your <S%H1>father:<s%> for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
